DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Q-Switched Nd:YAG Laser therapy are effective in reduction of Cutaneous macular amyloidosis.
DOC.detailed_description: We treat the macular amyloidosis cases by Q-Switched Nd:YAG Laser and compare the before and after treatment situation by the photos and colorimetric assessment.
DOC.criteria: Macular amyloidosis confirmed cases Pregnancy and breast feeding Over 18 years old
